text: Hagi Anumzamo'ma asimu'ma antegeno'a, ti hageno makaza eri harafi huno vahe'mofo ananke avamente eviaza nehie. Ama mopafi vahera Anumzamo'a zamazeri haviza nehige'za, zamahirahiku nehaze. Hagi hosi afumofo agipi aini atupa rentete'za, ovuku'ma hazarega zamavare'za vazaza huno, Anumzamo'a antahi antahi'zamia zamazeri savri huno ovuku hanarega vanige'za ome haviza hugahaze.
